```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
source("tomgro.r")
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
sim <- tomgro_single(
  T_mean        = 28,       
  PPFD_mean     = 150,      
  percent_manure = 55,       
  plant_type    = "cherry"   
)
colnames(sim)[5:9] <- c("W", "Wf", "Wm", "LAI", "N")
sim$Day <- 1:nrow(sim)

```

```{r}
plot_df <- sim %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(W, Wf, Wm, LAI, N),
               names_to = "Variable",
               values_to = "Value")

ggplot(plot_df, aes(x = Day, y = Value)) +
  geom_line(color = "darkblue", size = 1) +
  facet_wrap(~Variable, scales = "free_y") +
  labs(
    title = "Tomato Growth State Variables over 90 Days",
    x = "Day",
    y = "Value"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

```
